LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="343fdefe79b041c9b02f38cffa6481fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Wow...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've been drawn to caves for most
of my life,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I haven't run into danger
like this in a long time.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="343fdefe79b041c9b02f38cffa6481fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]My life's quite precious to me...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Thanks for
helping.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] After all,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can only poke around in
caves if I'm alive, right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="343fdefe79b041c9b02f38cffa6481fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Oh, I should introduce myself...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf01"/]Dash[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I've explored all over the universe,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] thanks
to my family's deep pockets.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="786ca04b411a4d5c8f17a1127fa57d80" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]The captain warned me that she'd be very
angry if I got stranded again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so I can't
go explore any caves.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="786ca04b411a4d5c8f17a1127fa57d80" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]Oh, heyâ€”I just had the best idea![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Starting
right now, I'm going to recognize you as my
top...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] only...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]pupil![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="786ca04b411a4d5c8f17a1127fa57d80" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I need you to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]explore the[System:Color name="Default"] [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]caves[System:Color name="Default"] around this
planet on my behalf.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You'll have to make
it [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]through them all the way to the exits[System:Color name="Default"].
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="e866bb5e5e6042659005025fbcf0fb0a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'd like to start by seeing what kinds of
skills you have.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Make your way through
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]5 caves[System:Color name="Default"], and report back.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="90711d9fd6684f0eab3899694da63033" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I can't tell you how disappointed I am not
to be able to do this myself,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I've got
high hopes for your tenacity.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="ee782c6e5ef541e1a2dd079175b70f84" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Be very careful around the creatures here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You can't explore more caves for me if you
don't make it safely back to the surface!
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="1b0a37092540482ea1bb0c5967fd32f8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]Wow![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I knew I saw promise in you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm a
great judge of caving potential.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Next, try
making your way through [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]10[System:Color name="Default"] [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]caves[System:Color name="Default"].
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="39b4868cf65a444586c2f49603f556ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my star pupil,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] are making great
progress to support my life's work!
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="ff11b369f1024c4d80541faec4f01f66" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]There may be a lot of danger,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but isn't
that just part of the thrill of getting to
explore caves?!
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="7b2fad36e16b4d009bdf62972b85bad5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You keep up an impressive pace when you
explore![etc:Wait frame="15"/] For your next target,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] how about...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]15[System:Color name="Default"] [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]caves[System:Color name="Default"]?
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="ea6350babc5b470ab1582f283cd0e9df" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]If you start to feel unsafe, go back to the
surface for a while.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Knowing when to quit
is essential when you explore caves.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="966db37e96d948649760898e06864617" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Listening to your reports after you
explore each cave gets me itching to
dive back underground myself.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="a3b08b4d76734202b83fa3b881e85aa4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]You really seem to understand the true
"spirit" of caves now![etc:Wait frame="15"/] For your final effort,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
make your way through [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]every cave[System:Color name="Default"]!
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="8beec289bb83491e918c505609ad54eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]It sure does seem like this planet has a
remarkable variety in its many caves.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="9f733fcffa15431da9af5011759ae645" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The caves here are full of mystery and
adventure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] with creatures and treasures
that point to a fascinating culture!
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="1ca50f608c2a40a9bcee5bd003464fc0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]It seems I do have excellent judgment.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You really are a top-notch pupil,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] both in
name and reality!
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="e52b41d7b5264ae9b5e69cc595ffe100" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]In recognition of your great achievements,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I'd like to offer this phrase I keep in mind
as parting words to you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e52b41d7b5264ae9b5e69cc595ffe100" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]"[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]You can always find me in the pits![System:Color name="Default"]"[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I hope we get a chance to explore
some caves together one day.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="72ea7481e79943998225649a70a51b38" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]You seem to be traveling through those
caves at a good clip.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Drop your latest
report on me.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="69a42dd4073e4b8981c51fb4f4fd4947" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I want to help you discover the "spirit" of
caves.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You should continue your endeavor
to explore even more of them.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="fe8b54fcc9ac431fbc3d972e2ce197a5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What's this?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You've already completed
your travels![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fe8b54fcc9ac431fbc3d972e2ce197a5" Scale="1"/]Whoa![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You're miles ahead of what I
was expecting.

[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="4888d135a2bc44d69c58a57759d43ddf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]My title of Cave Researcher feels even
more mediocre in the face of your great
achievements.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You've done amazing work!
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearB0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="be63a9949446478ca1bb5e9e138934c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I see you've already made your way
through several caves.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I would expect
no less from my star pupil!

[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="6496dbefae2647edba6837985a685c2b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Your attitude...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]the way you take on these
caves so enthusiastically...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's like when
I first discovered the underground world.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="28117d27360c4b07aba4a4a2fd9e0c7d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]About that "Industrial Maze" matter you
reported...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That sounded extremely
interesting![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="28117d27360c4b07aba4a4a2fd9e0c7d" Scale="1"/]The caves repeatedly show evidence of
intelligent life-forms that evolved in an
entirely different way from us.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="28117d27360c4b07aba4a4a2fd9e0c7d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Machinery that keeps working forever,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
floors that float in the air...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It sure does
stir the imagination!
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="50adea9f931d4b8da1e2b7a38629eb8a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]When I heard your report about the
Secluded Courtyard,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was moved by
the beauty of the silence you described.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="50adea9f931d4b8da1e2b7a38629eb8a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]White sand spread out with a pattern in it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Hard botanical cylinders arranged here
and there.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="50adea9f931d4b8da1e2b7a38629eb8a" Scale="1"/]There even seems to be significance to
how the flat rocks are lined up...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] These
are traces of a civilization we don't know.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="d0fe6f6abd8e4325967a2d6ad7cc94dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Among the many caves you've been to,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my
sense of aesthetic is most drawn to the
Seafloor Resort.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d0fe6f6abd8e4325967a2d6ad7cc94dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]The marine-blue water,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the expansive
sandy beach,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the beautiful, strange,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
sometimes dangerous aquatic creatures...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d0fe6f6abd8e4325967a2d6ad7cc94dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The constant sound of flowing water
must've been peaceful as well.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="0f61cea680fd46e6b26af32d343af723" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]The building-block clearing like out of a
fairy tale,[etc:Wait frame="15"/] the pastel-colored floor that
creates a tranquil and bright mood...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0f61cea680fd46e6b26af32d343af723" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Thriving giant mushrooms to jump and
play on...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It does feel dreamy, like the
name Dream Home implies.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0f61cea680fd46e6b26af32d343af723" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]It shows the playfulness possible when a
culture matures...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] This cave really stokes
one's inner adventurer and poet!
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="9c368b4c468143d7b78d20fd0ad048da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The Mud Pit you reported on...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]a lake of
poisonous mucus where spores and
mycelia are interwoven.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9c368b4c468143d7b78d20fd0ad048da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I'm so jealous that you got to explore that
cave and get all sticky and mucky hiking
through it![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9c368b4c468143d7b78d20fd0ad048da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]After all, the more hardship,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the bigger
the sense of accomplishment when you
make it to the end!
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="374a2f3df0b9416b9d4f0e7024929440" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Be very careful around the creatures here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You can't explore more caves for me if you
don't make it safely back to the surface!
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="6244a37ea88b4eddb2af6831b23c4ea4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]There may be a lot of danger,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but isn't
that just part of the thrill of getting to
explore caves?!
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="d230380626944297bca6ae5898703fbb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]If you start to feel unsafe, go back to the
surface for a while.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Knowing when to quit
is essential when you explore caves.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="827f1e4c620544e4a863315dc54c3585" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The caves here are full of mystery and
adventure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] with creatures and treasures
that point to a fascinating culture!
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="3331ddafb203431d9c43cda22e06f34c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]This is embarrassing to admit,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I've
been stranded in caves countless times,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
only to be saved by Rescue Pups like you.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="eeeefec9f5ea4298bb209458b9bbab22" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I live my life bouncing from adventure to
adventure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so sadly I can't have a dog.
LF000.LF000_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="de557dca575b47da8a00276073b7dcc7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]A few years ago,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was diving in a cave
made of a mirror-like substance.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Wherever
I looked,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I saw countless copies of myself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="de557dca575b47da8a00276073b7dcc7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]You and I look so much alike,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it brought
back memories from that eerie experience.
